name: The Battery (ilidanox)
description:
Hi!

I don't really know what to write here. The Battery is game created for Ludum Dare 46 with theme: Keep it alive

Well, The battery is a arcade-like top-down game, when your character needs to clear the dungeon, collect batteries to keep his "explorer's light" up and running. He fights various monsters and collects new weapons, potions and progresses on his journey to uncover the ULTIMATE power source.
